item.description:
FORUM Artist Series: Ron Ranere's "Liquid Light"
----------------------------------------

Award winning photographer Ron Ranere showcases his latest work "Liquid Light," an exploration of fluidity, motion and light, presented by Suzanne Schultz Gallery

Join us at FORUM for the artist reception with live jazz and a featured cocktail on August 16th, from 6pm-9pm. "Liquid Light" will be showcased for 6 weeks.

Ron Ranere Positive Image Studios (www.positiveimage-boston.com)

Suzanne Schultz Gallery (www.suzanne-schultz.com)

For more information, email info@forumboston.com or call us at (857) 991-1831.

Bring your business cards and get ready to network with others in attendance!
item.name: MEETUP AT FORUM - No Meetup fee to attend :-)
